DOC.brief_summary: Whole body vibration ( WBV ) help improve muscle flexibility stimulate neuromuscular function . But dearth literature prove effectiveness improve flexibility upper limb muscle . Therefore purpose study determine effect vibration improve upper limb flexibility . This experimental research conduct recruit participant age 19 27 history injury upper limb . They randomly assign two group ; experimental ( vibration ) control ( vibration ) group . The WBV machine use provide vibration upper extremity place palm vibration platform . The outcome measure active chest flexibility shoulder reach flexibility perform pre post vibration .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effects Vibration Shoulder Flexibility - Experimental Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: age 19 28 athletic background shoulder pain injury within 12 month , recent back pain neck pain , recent fever high blood pressure .
